Job Title: Art Director

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
The Digital Art Director, specializing in Motion Graphics, the Digital Art Director will play a crucial role in conceptualizing and producing dynamic visual content for digital displays. Working closely with the creative team, you will be responsible for crafting compelling motion graphics that bring to life the ideas that support client initiatives and goals. The Digital AD must understand and be aware of the Quad production/design capabilities/processes, and a knowledge of industry standards and best practices related to digital graphic design. Additionally, the Digital AD must have the experience/ability/maturity to read, understand, and work with the clients.

Key Responsibilities

Conceptualize and develop innovative motion graphics concepts for digital displays, ensuring alignment with project objectives and brand guidelines.Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, and content creators to bring motion graphic concepts to life.Lead the creation process from storyboard development to final execution, ensuring high-quality deliverables that meet project timelines.Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies in motion graphics, incorporating new techniques and tools to enhance creative output.Provide guidance and mentorship to team members, fostering a collaborative and creative work environment.Attend client meetings and present creative materials and ideasCreate rough concept/layouts, to help communicate the wants and needs for the project. This includes sketches or making a rough digital compCoordinate with stakeholders to gather requirements and feedback, iterating on designs to achieve desired outcomes.Must have strong project management skills, ability to think strategically and manage multiple priorities, anticipate demands, coordinate stringent deadlines and properly estimate time for workConduct quality assurance checks on motion graphics deliverables, ensuring consistency and accuracy across all platforms.Manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritizing tasks effectively to meet deadlines and deliver exceptional results

Qualifications

Proven experience as a Digital Art Director or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing expertise in motion graphics for digital displays.Proficiency in industry-standard software such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, and Cinema 4D.Solid understanding of design principles, typography, and color theory.Excellent storytelling and conceptualization skills, with the ability to translate ideas into visually compelling motion graphics.Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.Detail-oriented with a keen eye for visual aesthetics and composition.Ability to adapt to fast-paced environments and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Experience working in an agency or creative studio environment is a plus.

Job Requirements

Appropriate education and/or experience may be substituted on an equivalent basis

Education: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Digital Media, Animation, or related field. or equivalent

Experience: 5-10 years of experience with motion graphics

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

5-7 plus years of experience as an Apple/Mac operator and Graphic Designer with knowledge of industry-standard software programs including, but not limited to Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, XD, Figma, and Sketch. Experience in Premier and After Effects preferred.Proven experience as a Digital Art Director or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing expertise in motion graphics for digital displays.Proficiency in industry-standard software such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, and Cinema 4D.Solid understanding of design principles, typography, and color theory.Excellent storytelling and conceptualization skills, with the ability to translate ideas into visually compelling motion graphics.Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.Detail-oriented with a keen eye for visual aesthetics and composition.Ability to adapt to fast-paced environments and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Experience working in an agency or creative studio environment is a plus. 

EOE/M/F/V/D

Experience Level (if available): Associate
